剅字的基本解释

剅
dōu
l巙
方言，水口，水道：剅口。剅嘴。
小裂。

剅字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lóu］
［《廣韻》落侯切，平侯，來。］
［《廣韻》當侯切，平侯，端。］
亦作“1”。
(1)方言。堤坝下面排水、灌水的口子，亦称横穿河堤的水道，如剅口；剅嘴。
(2)用于地名。湖北省潜江县有蒋家剅。

剅字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【刀字部】　剅； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页139第28
【唐韻】洛侯切，音樓。小穿也。【玉篇】小裂也。又【唐韻】【集韻】?當侯切，音兜。義同。又【集韻】一曰割也。或作㓸?。

Yan
Basic explanation of words
Yan
dōu
l 巙
Dialect, Shuikou, Waterway: 剅口. Slap your mouth.
Small cracks.
Yan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lóu］
["Guangyun" Luohou cut, Pinghou, come. ]
["Guangyun" Danghou cut, Pinghou, end. ]
Also known as "1".
(1) Dialects. The opening for drainage and irrigation under the dam, also known as the waterway that crosses the embankment, such as the mouth; the mouth.
(2) Used for place names. There is Jiang Jiayan in Qianjiang County, Hubei Province.
Yan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset 2] [Knife word department] 　剅; Kangxi strokes: 9; Page number: page 139-28
[Tang Yun] Luohouqie, Yinlou. Small wear also. [Jade articles] Small cracks too. Also 【Tang Yun】【Ji Yun】? Danghou cut, sound pocket. The same meaning. [Jiyun] One said, "Cut also". Or as 㓸?.
